p2_project_2016.unisa.simulatorelement.robot.soldier

Class Soldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • p2_project_2016.unisa.simulatorelement.Element
      • p2_project_2016.unisa.simulatorelement.robot.Robot
        • p2_project_2016.unisa.simulatorelement.robot.soldier.Soldier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, CanAttack, Curable, Damageable, Drawable, Insertable, Movable, Readable, ShieldRestorable

    public class Soldier
extends Robot
implements CanAttack, ShieldRestorable
    Soldato, estensione di Robot. Può attaccare gli oggetti Damageable e utilizza uno scudo per ridurre eventuali danni subiti
    Author:
    tullio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
